title: Need some light assistance
body: What does this mean? It says I can get end of season rewards, but what does the "2 queues 3 queues" mean? I thought it was as straight forward as it sounded and just meant play 2 games in this division but I've played a few more then that. Anyone have any idea?

replies.body: All it means is that you can earn chromas for the Victorious Orianna skin by ranking gold+ in multiple queues. Having gold+ in 1 queue gives you the base skin, while having gold+ in 2 or 3 queues gives you one or both of the chromas.
To clarify for OP just in case, the 3 queues are SR Ranked Solo/Duo, SR Ranked Flex, TT Ranked Flex.
